data.message: Fix Cinematch CEO login error - username collision bug: Root cause: handle_new_user trigger only handled ON CONFLICT (id), not username conflicts. Fixed trigger to loop and find unique username. Also made dashboard redirect to onboarding if profile missing, and onboarding now creates profile if trigger failed. Migration applied to Supabase.
data.task: Fix Cinematch CEO login error - username collision bug
data.outcome: Root cause: handle_new_user trigger only handled ON CONFLICT (id), not username conflicts. Fixed trigger to loop and find unique username. Also made dashboard redirect to onboarding if profile missing, and onboarding now creates profile if trigger failed. Migration applied to Supabase.
